sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ProductDetail() { const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + "/product/" + id) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((res) => setProduct(res.product)); }, []); return (
